C

call(ProceedingJoinPoint, Retryable) - Method in class org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects.RetryableAspect
Runs a method call with retries.
CircuitBreaker - Annotation Type in org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects
Marks a method as one to be wrapped with a CircuitBreaker.
CircuitBreakerAspect - Class in org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects
Surrounds methods decorated with the CircuitBreaker annotation with a named CircuitBreaker.
CircuitBreakerAspect() - Constructor for class org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects.CircuitBreakerAspect
Default constructor.

G

getCircuitBreakerFactory() - Method in class org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects.CircuitBreakerAspect
Get the CircuitBreakerFactory that is being used to create new CircuitBreaker instances.
getPerformanceMonitorFactory() - Method in class org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects.PerformanceMonitorAspect
Get the PerformanceMonitorFactory that is being used to create new PerformanceMonitor instances.

M

monitor(ProceedingJoinPoint, CircuitBreaker) - Method in class org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects.CircuitBreakerAspect
Runs a method call through the configured CircuitBreaker.
monitor(ProceedingJoinPoint, PerformanceMonitor) - Method in class org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects.PerformanceMonitorAspect
Wraps a method annotated with the PerformanceMonitor annotation with a PerformanceMonitor.

O

org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects - package org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects
This package provides aspects and annotations to allow existing code to be wrapped in CircuitBreaker or PerformanceMonitor wrappers using AOP.

P

PerformanceMonitor - Annotation Type in org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects
Annotation that is used to indicate that a method should be wrapped by a PerformanceMonitor.
PerformanceMonitorAspect - Class in org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects
Aspect that wraps methods annotated with PerformanceMonitor with a PerformanceMonitor.
PerformanceMonitorAspect() - Constructor for class org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects.PerformanceMonitorAspect
Default constructor.

R

Retryable - Annotation Type in org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects
Marks a method as one to be wrapped with a RetryableAspect.
RetryableAspect - Class in org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects
Surrounds methods decorated with the Retryable annotation with logic to retry the method call.
RetryableAspect() - Constructor for class org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects.RetryableAspect
Default constructor.

S

setCircuitBreakerFactory(CircuitBreakerFactory) - Method in class org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects.CircuitBreakerAspect
Sets the CircuitBreakerFactory to use when creating new CircuitBreaker instances.
setPerformanceMonitorFactory(PerformanceMonitorFactory) - Method in class org.fishwife.jrugged.aspects.PerformanceMonitorAspect
Sets the PerformanceMonitorFactory to use when creating new PerformanceMonitor instances.
